54 
55 FixCollisionObjects::FixCollisionObjects(const std::string& name) : PropagatingEitherWay(name) {
56  auto& p = properties();
57  p.declare<double>("max_penetration", "maximally corrected penetration depth");
58  p.declare<geometry_msgs::Vector3>("direction", "direction vector to use for corrections");
59 }
60 
61 void FixCollisionObjects::computeForward(const InterfaceState& from) {
62  planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr to = from.scene()->diff();
63  sendForward(from, InterfaceState(to), fixCollisions(*to));
64 }
65 
66 void FixCollisionObjects::computeBackward(const InterfaceState& to) {
67  planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr from = to.scene()->diff();
68  sendBackward(InterfaceState(from), to, fixCollisions(*from));
69 }
70 
71 bool computeCorrection(const std::vector<cd::Contact>& contacts, Eigen::Vector3d& correction, double max_penetration) {
72  correction.setZero();
73  for (const cd::Contact& c : contacts) {
74  if ((c.body_type_1 != cd::BodyTypes::WORLD_OBJECT && c.body_type_2 != cd::BodyTypes::WORLD_OBJECT)) {
75  ROS_WARN_STREAM_NAMED("FixCollisionObjects", "Cannot fix collision between " << c.body_name_1 << " and "
76  << c.body_name_2);
77  return false;
78  }
79  if (c.body_type_1 == cd::BodyTypes::WORLD_OBJECT)
80  correction -= c.depth * c.normal;
81  else
82  correction += c.depth * c.normal;
83  }
84  // average and add tolerance
85  double norm = correction.norm();
86  double rounded = norm / contacts.size() + 1.e-3;
87  correction *= rounded / norm;
88  return true;
89 }
90 
91 SubTrajectory FixCollisionObjects::fixCollisions(planning_scene::PlanningScene& scene) const {
92  SubTrajectory result;
93  const auto& props = properties();
94  double max_penetration = props.get<double>("max_penetration");
95  const boost::any& dir = props.get("direction");
96 
97  cd::CollisionRequest req;
98  cd::CollisionResult res;
99  req.group_name = ""; // check collisions for complete robot
100  req.contacts = true;
101  req.max_contacts = 100;
102  req.max_contacts_per_pair = 100;
103  req.verbose = false;
104  req.distance = false;
105 
106  vm::Marker m;
107  m.header.frame_id = scene.getPlanningFrame();
108  m.ns = "collisions";
109 
110  bool failure = false;
111  while (!failure) {
112  res.clear();
113 #if MOVEIT_MASTER
114  scene.getCollisionEnv()->checkRobotCollision(req, res, scene.getCurrentState(),
115  scene.getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
116 #else
117  scene.getCollisionWorld()->checkRobotCollision(req, res, *scene.getCollisionRobotUnpadded(),
118  scene.getCurrentState(), scene.getAllowedCollisionMatrix());
119 #endif
120  if (!res.collision)
121  return result;
122 
123  for (const auto& info : res.contacts) {
124  Eigen::Vector3d correction;
125  failure = !computeCorrection(info.second, correction, max_penetration);
126  if (failure)
127  break;
128  double depth = correction.norm();
129  failure = depth > max_penetration;
130 
131  // marker indicating correction
132  const cd::Contact& c = info.second.front();
133  rviz_marker_tools::setColor(m.color, failure ? rviz_marker_tools::RED : rviz_marker_tools::GREEN);
134  tf::poseEigenToMsg(Eigen::Translation3d(c.pos) *
135  Eigen::Quaterniond::FromTwoVectors(Eigen::Vector3d::UnitX(), correction),
136  m.pose);
137  rviz_marker_tools::makeArrow(m, depth, true);
138  result.markers().push_back(m);
139  if (failure)
140  break;
141 
142  // fix collision by shifting object along correction direction
143  if (!dir.empty()) // if explicitly given, use this correction direction
144  tf::vectorMsgToEigen(boost::any_cast<geometry_msgs::Vector3>(dir), correction);
145 
146  const std::string& name = c.body_type_1 == cd::BodyTypes::WORLD_OBJECT ? c.body_name_1 : c.body_name_2;
147  scene.getWorldNonConst()->moveObject(name, Eigen::Isometry3d(Eigen::Translation3d(correction)));
148  }
149  }
150 
151  // failure
152  result.markAsFailure();
153  return result;
154 }
155 } // namespace stages
156 } // namespace task_constructor
157 } // namespace moveit
